column2:
From the makers of Slendercam!  Show your Irish pride with a Leprechaun Photo Bomb!

With Leprecam, you can add a Leprechaun to any photo! Simply take a photo or use an existing one, add one of our 8 Leprechauns, then edit the added them to fit seamlessly into your picture.   Process the photo with cool effects or make a Meme, then share your lucky Irish creation via Facebook, Twitter, and email! 

Features: 
* 8 different Leprechauns to choose from 
* Scale, Move, and Erase the Leprechaun so he seamlessly fits any scene 
* Use our photo editing features including Effects, Enhance, Crop, Brightness, Contrast, Red Eye, Frames and more
* Create a Meme
* Share to Facebook and Twitter, or email
